properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 3:16AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional
snow accumulations of up to two inches, except up to 4 inches
over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the
second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow
accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, except up to 12 inches over the
Owyhee mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the
Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow is possible.

* WHERE...Owyhee Mountains and Southwest Highlands zones.

* WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST
this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from
midnight tonight to 6 AM MST Monday. For the Winter Storm
Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
